pages.text: This card is used to link $(l:rftoolspower:powerstorage/dimensionalcell)Dimensional Cells$() together. When crafted, it will be $(thing)Unlinked.$() Insert it into a Power Cell to Link it. If the cell is not currently Linked, this will create a new Link. if there is already a card in the leftmost slot, then the new card will be reprogrammed to the same Link.
